title: "美股三大指数集体下跌 纳指收跌1.56%"
date: 2022-03-04 05:00:15 +0800
categories: dongfangcaifuyanjiuzhongxin
tags: 东方财富研究中心新闻
---

style="color:#009900;font-family:&quot;pingfang sc&quot;, &quot;microsoft yahei&quot;;font-size:16px;text-align:center;background-color:#ffffff;">0.29%；纳指下跌<span style="color:#009900;font-family:&quot;pingfang sc&quot;, &quot;microsoft yahei&quot;;font-size:16px;text-align:center;background-color:#ffffff;">214.08点，收报<span style="color:#494949;font-family:&quot;pingfang sc&quot;, &quot;microsoft yahei&quot;;font-size:28px;font-weight:700;text-align:center;background-color:#ffffff;"><span class="price_down blinkgreen"
